hi,

 

I am trying to test a class that is supposed to run inside an 
Application Server context. This class will be used by EJBs and uses 
some of the resources offered by the Application Server, so it won't 
run outside de App Server. I would like to know what the best 
strategy would be. What I did was to create a tester EJB that runs 
all the tests for the class, and to write a TestCase that uses this 
tester EJB. This approach has two main problems. First, from the EJB 
I am not able to use some of the TestCase features, like the use of 
assert methods. Second, I am writing the test code twice, once in the 
EJB and then again in the TestCase.

 

I would appreciate it if you can give some pointers.

 

Thanks in advance,
